title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 182.44 - Right turn on red signal
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 182.44 - Right turn on red signal

State Regulations
(a) Taconic

State Parkway. (1)

All vehicles approaching
the Taconic State Parkway are prohibited from making a right turn on red signal
at the following intersections: Cleveland Street

Lakeview Avenue

Stevens Avenue
(2)

All vehicles on the Taconic State Parkway
are prohibited from making a right turn on red signal at the following
intersections: Cleveland Street, southbound
(b) Saw Mill River Parkway. (1)

All vehicles approaching the Saw Mill

River Parkway are prohibited from making a right turn on red signal at the
following intersections: Hearst Street

Tompkins Avenue

Lawrence Street

Grant Street

Roaring Brook Road, eastbound
(2)

All vehicles on the Saw Mill River

Parkway are prohibited from making a right turn on red signal at the following
locations: Hearst Street, southbound

Tompkins Avenue, northbound

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
182.44

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
